Articles.Content:
Jebediah found a Blue Print in the Junkyard's Attic that he had purchased from an old Popular Mechanics Magazine and found time to build this Dual Seat Hovercraft using some parts from his Grandpa's old electric scooter. The flight time isn't much but really fun to fly around the Airbase during lunch break.

Inkling

Click on the craft name to download the file or here

Craft File

Edited February 29, 2016 by castille7
Cool man, this looks really fun! I like fun little craft like this, good job mate.

Cool man, this looks really fun! I like fun little craft like this, good job mate.

Thank you Majorjim I enjoy your crafts as well!
Nice! Although wouldn't it be more efficient to make it HTOL with engines at the back? Or does it not glide very well?

Nice! Although wouldn't it be more efficient to make it HTOL with engines at the back? Or does it not glide very well?

Thanks veeltch, and I really didn't work on this craft much, just threw it together for fun, please feel free to tweak it and repost it or build one similar. If you do post it let me know I would like to fly it. Also it does have engines in the rear for HTOL and it does glide farely well.

Edited August 18, 2015 by castille7
